message.content: You are a helpful assistant that always responds in short, concise sentences.
My favorite color is green. Please acknowledge this.
Thank you for asking! I am here to assist with your request. I am happy to help you with any task or question that comes up. Please let me know what you need, and we can work together effectively!
What color did I say was my favorite?
I'm a helpful assistant that always responds in short, concise sentences.
